about_the_game:
Experience the thrill of a shmup game like the arcade classics. With just the right amount of story, lots of action, and many, many bullets.

Live a great adventure through the known universe, conquering new planets. The human race is no longer a peaceful race, now we want more... and our fleets are dedicated to subduing the new planets that are still trying to defend themselves.

The congregation of countries will conquer the remaining rebels to achieve total unity under human command.

Current early access features:

  • 3 ships with only one control profile.
  • in level upgrades, power ups, and collectables.
  • 3 full handcrafted levels. along with at least 7 enemy types each.
  • Local score ranking & level punctuation.
  • Basic menu navigation & experience.

The game is MISSING several key features:

  • Proper music & sound.
  • Pixel Fonts (current fonts can appear distorted).
  • UX / UI improvements. (like end level screen, ingame texts, etc).
  • Progression.
  • Unlocking progress.
  • Extra ship animations.
  • Extra weapon level up & laser improvements.
  • Extra levels.
  • Extra effects like enemy blinking, or better explosions and FX.
  • Better looking screens.
  • Controller & input setup screens.
  • Story cutscenes before each level.
  • Dificulty modes.
  • Cooperative local multiplayer.
  • Steam scoreboards.
  • Steam achievements.
  • Steam cards.
  • Optimizations.

name: A Million Conquests

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Experience the thrill of a shmup game like the arcade classics. With just the right amount of story, lots of action, and many, many bullets.
